英文法規名稱: The Regulations on Reasonable Matters as Exceptions to Rescind the Distance Sales
中文法規名稱: 通訊交易解除權合理例外情事適用準則

法規內容.條文內容: The regulations are enacted pursuant to Paragraph 2, Article 19 of the “Consumer Protection Act”. (hereinafter referred to as the “Act”)

Matters related to rescind the distance sales shall apply to provisions prescribed in the mandatory or prohibitory provisions of standard contracts set forth pursuant to Paragraph 1, Article 17 of the Act, by the competent authorities at the central government.
The Regulations shall come into force on January 1, 2016.
